oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Remnant of a note describing a ring given to Portia Davis Gause
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This tattered remnant of a note written by Portia Davis Gause of Legardo in Wilson County describes a ring given to her by Mr. Green before the war. She wrote that he was "either killed during the War in the States or died of fever in camp." The ring was; engraved with "Remember the giver." Note: he was possibly a Cumberland University student. See wils016.
